description.en: Orient Project (OFT), comes with a different view, currently we see many fake projects, making it difficult to see good projects. Orient arrives at the DeFI market to innovate, choosing an ethereum network with great liquidity and volume and ERC20 token, deploying staking resources, agriculture, among others, where the project seeks a reward for a certain time, participate in the Orient networks,  it will be a great opportunity to start low and get it for a long period rewards! The future is ahead!
